summary: This is a collection of all my 'Supplies' mods in one easy-to-find place.
descriptionHtml:
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/37696-0-1478095885.jpg[/img]

This is a collection of all my 'Supplies' mods (6 stand-alone mods) in one easy-to-find place.

Each mod is available in the combined All-In-One file or as separate files.

To download, choose either the main file or pick any of the optional files.

Main:
Crafting Supplies - All In One (This file contains all of my 'Supplies' mods in one .esp) [color=#00ffff]Requires Hearthfire & Dragonborn DLC[/color]

Optional:
Smithing Supplies
Enchanting Supplies
Alchemy Supplies
Hearthfire Supplies [color=#00ffff]Requires Hearthfire DLC[/color]
Dragonborn Supplies [color=#00ffff]Requires Dragonborn DLC[/color]
Cooking Supplies
Cooking Supplies - Hearthfire Edtion [color=#00ffff]Requires Hearthfire DLC[/color]

Only use one of the Cooking Supplies files, not both.

[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/37696-1-1478095885.jpg[/img]

NOTE: This mod is compatible with the 'Open Cities' mod by Arthmoor

This mod adds a chest near the forge in Whiterun that contains ALL smithing items including Dragon Bone and Scales, Deadra Hearts, Ingots, Leather, Gems and Firewood which is used in the DLC Dawnguard.

The chest contains 1000 of each item so there is enough supplies to make anything you wish providing you have the nesessary perks, if not use about 300 of the Iron ingots and leather strips to master Smithing.

The chest will restock every time you open it, no more waiting (unlimited supplies).

Hope you enjoy.

[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/37696-2-1478095885.jpg[/img]

This mod adds a chest in Dragonsreach (in the room with the Enchanting table) that contains 1000 of ALL soul gems,Petty, Lesser, Common, Greater, Grand and Black.

It also includes assorted Weapons, Armor and Jewelry with EVERY enchantment in
the game so you can disenchant them to gain the enchantments yourself.

The chest will restock every time you open it, no more waiting (unlimited supplies).

[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/37696-3-1478095885.jpg[/img]

Ever wanted to be an Alchemist but couldn't be bothered to hunt Ingredients well look no further.

This mod adds a Satchel in Dragonsreach (on the Alchemy table) that contains 1000 of ALL alchemy ingredients including Nirnroot, Daedra Hearts and those pesky Jazbay Grape.

Also it contains all known recipes so you'll waste no time in finding out what ingredients go together.

The satchel will restock every thime you open it, no more waiting (unlimited supplies).

[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/37696-4-1478095885.jpg[/img]

This mod adds enough of each material and items required to build your hearthfire house and furnish it.

The materials and items include Clay, Quarried Stone, Locks, Hindges, Glass, Iron Fittings, Straw, Goat Horns and other misc items required to make the furnishings, all these items can be found in the pre-existing chest near the Carpenter's Workbench of all 3 plots of land that you can build on. It also adds 3000 gold to the chest to buy 300 logs.

NOTE: This does not add a new chest, it simply changes the inventory of the chast that is already there.

This is a very helpful mod as when I built one house I used all the Iron Ingots and other things that took me hours of play time to collect, this mod is for those who do not wish to part with or spend hours collecting all the items the house requires.

Hope you enjoy.

[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/37696-5-1478095885.jpg[/img]

WARNING! This mod contains spoilers, if you have not completed the Dragonborn DLC please do not read further, unless you don't care about spoilers in which case, continue.

This mod adds a chest near the smelter at the Blacksmith's in Ravenrock (the first place you visit).
The chest contains 1000 of each item needed for Smithing, Alchemy and the all new Staff Enchanting.

The new items throughout Solstheim can be hard to obtain in vast quantities and endlessly searching for them can detract from the whole experience, this mod allows you to forget about that and enjoy Solsteim without needless tresure hunts.

The chest will restock every time you open it, no more waiting (unlimited supplies).

P.S.
It might not be obvious given the name "Dragonborn Supplies" but this mod requires the DLC "Dragonborn", it's not called "Dragonborn Supplies" because it has anything to do with you, the Dragonborn. And I said Dragonborn 4 times, now 5 in one sentence.[url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=125246170]

[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/37696-6-1478095884.jpg[/img][/url]

This mods adds a sack to the Bannered Mare in Whiterun with 1000 of each type of food, including Fruit & Veg, Meat, Wine and more.
There are 2 version of this mod, the standard version that requires no DLC and the Hearthfire Edtion which includes Hearthfire food items and obviously requires the Hearthfire DLC.

The sack will restock every thime you open it, no more waiting (unlimited supplies).

NOTE: This mod may conflict with any other mods that edits the interior of the Bannered Mare.

[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/37696-7-1478095884.jpg[/img]

Manual:
Download any of the main file you want to use,
unzip the file and drop the .esp(s) and .bsa(s) into your Skyrim Data Folder located here:
Local Disk(C:)Program Files/Steam/Steam Apps/Common/Skyrim/Data

Nexus Mod Manager:
Press 'Download With Manager' button.
Open NMM and activate them, if you have more than one of the 'Supplies' mods, when asked to upgrade say no,
the NMM doesn't recognize them as individual mods.

[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/37696-8-1478095884.jpg[/img]

Delete the .esp(s) and .bsa(s) from your Skyrim Data Folder located here:
Local Disk(C:)Program Files/Steam/Steam Apps/Common/Skyrim/Data
author: MadTod
